resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS histories_views (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , id_history TEXT, visto INT(2),num_fotos INT(2))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS histories (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,fecha TEXT,nombre_pet TEXT,id_pet INTEGER,uri_photo TEXT,uri_perfil TEXT,identificador TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pets (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , id_pet TEXT, name_pet TEXT,id_propietary int,name_propietary TEXT,raza TEXT,peso TEXT,genero TEXT, descripcion TEXT,edad TEXT,rating INT,type_pet INT,url_foto TEXT,url_photo_tumbh TEXT,id_type_raza INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS propietary (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,id_propietary TEXT,name_propietary TEXT, descripcion TEXT,url_photo TEXT,rating REAL,followers INT,posts INT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS razas (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , name_eng TEXT, nam_esp TEXT,id_type_pet INT,photo TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS saved_posts(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,id_from_web INT, name_pet TEXT,name_user TEXT,urls_posts TEXT, url_photo_user TEXT, description TEXT,date_post TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS liked_posts(id_from_web INT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notifications(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,title TEXT,body TEXT,url_resource TEXT, type_notification INT,id_usuario INT,url_image_extra TEXT,vista INTEGER,id_document_notification TEXT,fecha TEXT,sincronizada INT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS relacion_follows (id_document TEXT,url_photo_user TEXT,name_user,uuid_user TEXT, id_user INT,name_nip_user TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS relacion_favorite_pets (id_document TEXT,url_photo_user TEXT,name_user TEXT,uuid_user TEXT, id_user INT,name_nip_user TEXT,id_pet INT,name_pet TEXT,url_photo_pet TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS search_recents (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ,url_photo TEXT,name TEXT, type_mascota INT,name_raza TEXT,type_save INT,id_usuario int,uuid_usuario TEXT, id_mascota INT,name_pet TEXT,name_tag TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS likes_comentarios(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, id_document TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS likes_tips(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, id_tip INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ids_users_follows(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, id_user INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS identificadores_histories(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, num_likes INTEGER,num_views INTEGER,identificador TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS liked_stories(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, identificador TEXT);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS temp_video_post(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, can_comment INTEGER,duracion INTEGER,aspect TEXT,type_pet INTEGER,type_post INTEGER, id_pet INTEGER,date_post TEXT,description TEXT,url_photo_pet TEXT,name_pet TEXT,thumb_video TEXT,urls_posts TEXT);
